derivation: or שְׁמוֹנֶה; feminine שְׁמֹנָה; or שְׁמוֹנָה; apparently from H8082 (שָׁמֵן) through the idea of plumpness;
outline:
1. eight, eighth
    1. eight (as cardinal number)
    2. eighth (as ordinal number)
    3. in combination with other numbers
strongs_def: a cardinal number, eight (as if a surplus above the 'perfect' seven); also (as ordinal) eighth
